mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL( CONCAT(SUBSTR(B.NEW_PEN_ID, 1, 14), LPAD( (SUBSTR(B.NEW_PEN_ID, 15, 6)) + 1 , 6, '0')) ,CONCAT('PENID_', DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d'), '000001') ) AS NEW_PEN_ID FROM ( SELECT MAX(A.PEN_ID) AS NEW_PEN_ID FROM PEN1000 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.PEN_ID LIKE CONCAT('PENID_', DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d'), '%') ) B

SELECT IFNULL( CONCAT(SUBSTR(B.NEW_REC_ID, 1, 11), LPAD( (SUBSTR(B.NEW_REC_ID, 12, 5)) + 1 , 5, '0')) , CONCAT('REC', DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d'), '00001') ) AS NEW_REC_ID FROM ( SELECT MAX(A.REC_ID) AS NEW_REC_ID FROM PEN1500 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.REC_ID LIKE CONCAT('REC', DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d'), '%') ) B

SELECT PEN_ID,MODIFY_USR_ID,MODIFY_USR_IP ,PEN_PRO_CON_PNUM,PEN_PRO_CON_NUM,PEN_CON_PNUM,PEN_CON_NUM FROM pen1000 # WHERE LENGTH(PEN_PRO_CON_PNUM)>13 OR LENGTH(PEN_PRO_CON_NUM)>13 OR LENGTH(PEN_CON_PNUM)>13 OR LENGTH(PEN_CON_NUM)>13

SELECT A.ITEM_ID , ( CASE WHEN A.SUB_ITEM IS NULL THEN A.ITEM_NM WHEN A.SUB_ITEM = '' THEN A.ITEM_NM ELSE CONCAT(A.ITEM_NM, '(', A.SUB_ITEM,')') END ) as ITEM_NM, ITEM_TYPE_CD AS GUBUN FROM PRO1000 A LEFT OUTER JOIN PEN1100 B ON B.ITEM_ID = A.ITEM_ID WHERE 1=1 AND B.PEN_ID = #{penId} AND B.ITEM_ID IS NOT NULL AND USE_CD = '01' AND ITEM_TYPE_CD = #{gubun} ORDER BY ITEM_ID
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pen1500 ( REC_ID, PEN_ID, ENT_ID, USR_ID, PSCL_STATE1, PSCL_STATE2, PSCL_STATE3, PSCL_STATE4, PSCL_STATE5, PSCL_STATE6, PSCL_REASON, RECOG_REASON, HELPER_YN, CHILD, HELPER_TYPE, HELPER_TYPE_ETC, HOME_ENV, HOME_TYPE, INMATE, TOTAL_REVIEW, REG_DTM, REG_USR_ID, REG_USR_IP,MODIFY_DTM, MODIFY_USR_ID, MODIFY_USR_IP ) VALUES ( #{recId}, #{penId}, #{entId}, #{usrId}, #{psclState1}, #{psclState2}, #{psclState3}, #{psclState4}, #{psclState5}, #{psclState6}, #{psclReason}, #{recogReason}, #{helperYn}, #{child}, #{helperType}, #{helperTypeEtc}, #{homeEnv}, #{homeType}, #{inmate}, #{totalReview}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{usrId}, #{accessIp} ,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{usrId}, #{accessIp} )

INSERT INTO pen1100 ( PEN_ID, ITEM_ID ,REG_USR_ID, REG_USR_IP,REG_DTM ,MODIFY_USR_ID,MODIFY_USR_IP,MODIFY_DTM ) VALUES ( #{penId}, #{itemId} ,#{usrId}, #{accessIp}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ,#{usrId}, #{accessIp}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
